hero.name: Mathieu Nguyen
hero.description: Front-end developer crafting fast, modern, and meaningful digital experiences. I design clear, intuitive interfaces that elevate your ideas and strengthen your brand. Curious, adaptable, and always exploring new challenges, I'm here to help turn your vision into something impactful.

about.title: Who I Am
about.description: I'm a Freelance Front-End Developer with 7 years of experience helping businesses and startups build clean, modern, and easy-to-use websites.

services.title: Services
services.description: From product development to ongoing support, I offer comprehensive solutions tailored to your business needs.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: A selection of my recent web development projects.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: I'm currently available for freelance work and open to new opportunities. If you have a project in mind or want to collaborate, let's connect!

metadata.title: Mathieu Nguyen - Front-End Web Developer
metadata.description: Freelance Front-End Web Developer with 7 years of experience creating high-performance, intuitive, and maintainable web interfaces using React, Next.js, and TypeScript.

openGraph.title: Mathieu Nguyen - Front-End Web Developer
openGraph.description: Freelance Front-End Web Developer specializing in React, Next.js, and modern web technologies

AboutPage.title: Know Who I Am
AboutPage.description: I turn ideas into interactive, user-friendly web applications. The divs below highlight my experience, technical skills, and the values that guide my work.

profile.intro2: Web Developer for 7 years, I create custom and optimized web solutions for companies or freelancers.
profile.intro3: I started coding out of a desire to solve problems and create tools that people can use and appreciate. Very quickly, I specialized in front-end development, with a particular focus on React and its ecosystem.
profile.intro4: From Alain Afflelou to my freelance activity, I've designed web applications prioritizing speed, accessibility, and reliability, while participating in architecture decisions and performance optimizations.
profile.intro5: Outside of work, I practice sports, particularly CrossFit and boxing, I nurture my passion for history and geopolitics, or I relax with a good video game.

hardSkills.title: Hard Skills
hardSkills.description: These are the technologies and programming languages I've worked with and continue to develop expertise in.

softSkills.title: Soft Skills
softSkills.description: These are the interpersonal and professional skills that help me work effectively and deliver quality results.

philosophy.0: Writing clean, maintainable, and scalable code
philosophy.1: Prioritizing user experience and intuitive interfaces

goals.2: Contributing to open-source and sharing knowledge

problemSolving.title: Problem Solving

adaptability.description: Quick learning of new technologies and methodologies

criticalThinking.title: Critical Thinking

metadata.title: About Me - Mathieu Nguyen | Front-End Developer
metadata.description: Learn about Mathieu Nguyen, a Freelance Front-End Developer with 7 years of experience in React, Next.js, and TypeScript. Discover my skills, experience, and what drives my passion for web development.

openGraph.title: About Me - Mathieu Nguyen | Front-End Developer
openGraph.description: Learn about my journey as a Front-End Developer with expertise in React, Next.js, and modern web technologies.

EducationPage.title: Educational Background
EducationPage.description: An overview of the education, practical experience, and technical learning that shaped my journey as a front-end developer.
EducationPage.degree: Professional Title: Web and Mobile Web Developer

highlights.0: Full-time intensive 700-hour program in modern web application development, structured in two complementary phases.
highlights.1: Technical Foundations: Mastery of front-end and back-end development fundamentals, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, PHP/MySQL, with hands-on practice in version control (Git), Agile methodologies, and professional web tools.
highlights.2: JavaScript/React Specialization: In-depth training in the modern JavaScript ecosystem, focusing on React component architecture, state management, REST API integration, and build tools such as Webpack and Babel.
highlights.3: Capstone Project: Collaborated in a team of four to build a full-stack role-playing platform featuring an interactive game board with real-time movements, integrated chat via WebSockets (Express.js), a blog, and a community forum. Developed a robust full-stack JS architecture (React/Node.js/Express) capable of handling multiple simultaneous connections, using Agile practices with weekly sprints and code reviews.

graduationProject.title: Graduation Project
graduationProject.description: Developed as a team of 4 developers, this comprehensive role-playing game platform features an interactive board with real-time player movements, creating an immersive gaming experience.

keyFeatures.label: Key Features
keyFeatures.content: Interactive game board with live character movements (round tokens), tabletop dice rolling system, toggleable tutorial overlay for new players, map selector, and integrated chat powered by WebSockets (Express.js).

techStack.label: Tech Stack
techStack.content: Full-stack JavaScript architecture (React/Node.js/Express) with real-time communication handling and support for multiple simultaneous connections.

methodology.label: Methodology
methodology.content: Agile development with weekly sprints and systematic code reviews, ensuring high-quality collaborative development.

descriptions.1: An international e-commerce platform dedicated to eyewear.
descriptions.2: A custom CRM solution designed to optimize recruitment and employee management.
descriptions.3: A time and client management platform for solo entrepreneurs and small businesses.
descriptions.4: A LinkedIn prospecting tool allowing you to search for missions from publications.
descriptions.5: A website for a freelance coach offering personalized support to increase their revenue.
descriptions.6: Website for a vintage-inspired barber shop offering a modern booking system.
descriptions.7: The digital showcase of a Mediterranean cuisine restaurant.

ServicesPage.title: What I Offer
ServicesPage.description: Looking for a reliable front-end developer to bring your project to life? I deliver quality web solutions tailored to your needs, whether it's a brand-new website, team collaboration, or ongoing maintenance. Let's work together to achieve your goals.

customWebsiteCreation.title: Custom Website Creation
customWebsiteCreation.description: Experienced in crafting fast, attractive websites that converts, from simple pages to full digital platforms.
customWebsiteCreation.subtitle: I create websites that inspire trust and convert your visitors into clients.

descriptionParagraphs.0: I design and develop custom websites tailored to your specific business needs and brand identity. Every project starts with understanding your goals, target audience, and unique value proposition. Whether you need a stunning showcase website, a high-converting landing page, or a fully-featured e-commerce platform, I deliver solutions that combine aesthetics with functionality.
descriptionParagraphs.1: My development process prioritizes user experience, ensuring your website is not only visually appealing but also intuitive and easy to navigate. I build responsive designs that look perfect on all devices—from desktop computers to smartphones—and optimize every aspect for fast loading times and smooth performance.
descriptionParagraphs.2: Beyond just building your website, I implement SEO best practices from the ground up, helping your site rank better in search engines. I also ensure accessibility standards are met, making your content available to all users. After launch, I provide guidance on content management and offer support to ensure your website continues to perform optimally.

approach.0: Modern, responsive design that adapts seamlessly to all screen sizes and devices
approach.1: Performance optimization for lightning-fast loading times and smooth interactions
approach.2: SEO-friendly architecture to improve search engine visibility from day one
approach.3: User-centered interface design focused on conversions and engagement
approach.4: Clean, maintainable code following industry best practices

examples.0: Showcase website for your business or company

technologies.0: React & Next.js for dynamic, high-performance websites
technologies.1: Tailwind CSS for responsive, customizable styling
technologies.3: Optimization tools for speed and accessibility

frontEndCollaboration.title: Front-end Collaboration
frontEndCollaboration.description: Skilled at working with teams to enhance projects, refine user interfaces, and deliver front-end solutions that keep development running smoothly.
frontEndCollaboration.subtitle: I join your team to build or evolve your web project.

descriptionParagraphs.0: I integrate seamlessly into your development team as a skilled front-end developer, bringing expertise in modern web technologies and a collaborative mindset. Whether you need short-term assistance for a specific sprint or long-term partnership for ongoing development, I adapt to your team's workflow, tools, and processes.
descriptionParagraphs.1: With experience in agile environments, I'm comfortable working with version control systems, participating in code reviews, and contributing to design system development. I believe in clear communication and thorough documentation, ensuring that my code is not only functional but also maintainable by the entire team.
descriptionParagraphs.2: I take pride in writing clean, semantic, and well-tested code that follows your team's conventions and best practices. Beyond just implementing features, I actively participate in technical discussions, suggest improvements, and help mentor junior developers when needed. My goal is to add value to your team while delivering high-quality results on time.

approach.0: Clean, maintainable code that follows your team's standards and conventions
approach.1: Collaborative mindset with strong communication and teamwork skills
approach.2: Proactive problem-solving and attention to technical details
approach.3: Flexibility to work with various tech stacks and development methodologies
approach.4: Active participation in code reviews and knowledge sharing

examples.0: Short or long-term assignment in direct collaboration with your staff
examples.1: Integration or redesign of existing interfaces
examples.2: Code review participation and quality assurance
examples.3: Implementation or evolution of a design system
examples.4: Collaboration with designers and backend developers

technologies.0: React, Next.js and TypeScript for high-quality typed code
technologies.1: Tailwind CSS for responsive, customizable styling
technologies.2: GenAI and MCP servers for agentic automation

maintenanceSupport.title: Maintenance & Support
maintenanceSupport.description: Focused on maintaining website performance and security, handling updates, optimizations, and troubleshooting to give clients peace of mind.
maintenanceSupport.subtitle: I handle your website maintenance to keep it efficient and secure.

descriptionParagraphs.0: Your website is a living asset that requires ongoing care to remain secure, fast, and effective. I provide comprehensive maintenance services that keep your site running smoothly, protecting it from security vulnerabilities and ensuring optimal performance as technology evolves and your business grows.
descriptionParagraphs.1: My maintenance approach is both preventive and reactive. I proactively monitor your website's health, perform regular updates to dependencies and plugins, and implement security patches before issues arise. At the same time, I'm available to quickly address any unexpected problems, bugs, or optimization needs that emerge.
descriptionParagraphs.2: Beyond technical upkeep, I provide clear monthly reports on your website's status, performance metrics, and any actions taken. You'll have access to priority support channels, and I offer guidance on best practices for content updates and site management. My goal is to give you peace of mind, knowing your website is in expert hands.

whatIncluded.0: Monthly health checks and performance monitoring to catch issues early
whatIncluded.1: Priority support with fast response times for urgent matters
whatIncluded.2: Regular security audits and immediate patching of vulnerabilities
whatIncluded.3: Detailed monthly reports on site health and maintenance activities
whatIncluded.4: Backup management and disaster recovery planning

examples.0: Dependency and plugin updates to keep your site current

technologies.0: Vercel for continuous hosting and deployment
technologies.1: OWASP recommendations for security best practices
technologies.2: Monitoring tools for performance and uptime
technologies.3: Updates and patches for dependencies and plugins
